input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product title:
Acoustic Research PR190N Component Video 3 pc Red/Blue/Green w/males ends (3 feet) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)

Product features:
24K gold plating
Precision machined 8 segment connectors
Nitrogen injected dielectric
Multi-shielded design
Pure silver coated oxygen-free copper
input_text.Response A: Wow, this sounds like an amazing cable for connecting audio and video components!  Some of the key features include 24K gold plating for superior conductivity, precision machined 8 segment connectors for a secure connection, and nitrogen injected dielectric and multi-shielding for enhanced signal clarity and noise rejection.  These cables are also made with pure silver coated oxygen-free copper wiring for enhanced signal transmission.  Overall this sounds like a high quality, high performance cable that will deliver exceptional audio and video performance!
input_text.Response B:
AR Pro Series II component video cable carries signals along three separate paths to achieve optimum picture quality. 24K gold-plated, split center pin and an 8 segment RCA connector delivers precise connections and lowers signal resistance for enhanced picture clarity. A multi-shielded design (two 95% copper braids and 100% aluminum Mylar foil) provide optimum isolation from EMI and RFI interference for enhanced picture clarity. A nitrogen-injected foam dielectric maintains 75 Ohm impedance for optimum video signal transfer while the solid 99.97% pure, silver-coated, oxygen-free, copper center conductor provides exceptional signal transfer for accurate video reproduction. 3' length.
Product features:
*24K gold plating
*Precision machined 8 segment connectors
*Nitrogen injected dielectric
*Multi-shielded design
*Pure silver coated oxygen-free copper

label_annotations.factors_a: Response A failed to use the title.
label_annotations.factors_b: Response B went and found product information not contained in the article but after checking using Google and Amazon I could verify what it stated was 100% correct.
label_annotations.feedback: Not sure if it is okay that Response B found product details that were totally correct an listed in product listing elsewhere on the web but not in the article text itself.  I assume yes since we are encouraged to use Google to fact check which I did and it all panned out so didn't downgrade it.
